overview: The purpose of this measure is to establish the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund to facilitate the administration of conference center programs among various campuses and operating units of the University of Hawaii System. [6] This bill also repeals the Conference Center Revolving Fund for the University of Hawaii at Hilo and Community College Conference Center Revolving Fund and lapses all unencumbered funds to the new fund. [6] The measure also intends to appropriate funds out of the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund. [6]
appropriations: The provided documents state that a purpose of this measure is to appropriate funds out of the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund. [6] However, no specific dollar amount for the appropriation is mentioned in the latest committee report. [6]
assumptions_and_methodology: The latest committee report does not contain information regarding the assumptions and methodology used for financial projections. [6]

revenue_sources: The latest committee report reaffirms that the measure will lapse all unencumbered funds from the repealed revolving funds to the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund. [6]
